At the dead of night, accompanied by his friend Abubeker, he silently escaped from his house: the assas- sms watched at the door; but they were deceived by the figure of Ali, who reposed on the bed, and was covered with the green vest- ment of the apostle. The Koreish respected the piety of the heroic youth; but some verses of Ali, which are still extant, exhibit an interesting picture of his anxiety, his tenderness, and his religious confidence.
